response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features that make it stand out in its category. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $100. However, I am willing to start our negotiation at $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value I believe it holds for someone like you. Would you be interested in discussing this further?", "product_price": 120}
